title: Living and Non-Living Things
content: Pupils learn the difference between living and non-living things, and how to identify them in their surroundings.

title: Plants Around Us
content: Children learn about different types of plants, their uses, and how they grow.

title: Animals Around Us
content: Pupils learn about animals, their habitats, and basic care.

title: Parts of the Body
content: Children learn the names and functions of major body parts.

title: Our Five Senses
content: Pupils explore the five senses: sight, hearing, smell, taste, and touch.

title: Seasons and Weather
content: Children learn about different seasons, types of weather, and how weather affects daily life.

title: Water and Its Uses
content: Pupils learn the importance of water, sources, and ways to conserve it.

title: Soil and Its Types
content: Children explore different types of soil and their uses in gardening and farming.

title: Air and Its Importance
content: Pupils learn about air, its role in life, and ways to keep it clean.

title: Safety at Home and School
content: Children learn basic safety rules at home and school to prevent accidents.
examples: Do not touch fire 🔥, Walk carefully 🏃‍♂️
